1 #include "coverage_path.h"
2 
7 void swarm_state_callback (const cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfStates::ConstPtr& msg)
8 {
9  // update cps uuids
10  for (auto cps : msg->states) {
11  // only consider cpss in the same behavior states
12  if (find(behaviors.begin(), behaviors.end(), cps.state) == behaviors.end())
13  continue;
14 
15  // index of cps in map
16  auto idx = swarm.find(cps.swarmio.node);
17 
18  // add new cps
19  if (idx == swarm.end()) {
20  swarm.emplace(cps.swarmio.node, Time::now());
21 
22  ROS_DEBUG("New CPS %s", cps.swarmio.node.c_str());
23 
24  // regenerate coverage path
25  reconfigure = true;
26  }
27 
28  // update existing cps
29  else {
30  idx->second = Time::now();
31  }
32  }
33 
34  // remove old cps
35  for (auto cps=swarm.cbegin(); cps!=swarm.cend();) {
36  if (cps->second + Duration(swarm_timeout) < Time::now()) {
37  ROS_DEBUG("Remove CPS %s", cps->first.c_str());
38  swarm.erase(cps++);
39 
40  // regenerate coverage path
41  reconfigure = true;
42  }
43  else {
44  ++cps;
45  }
46  }
47 }
48 
55 bool generate_path (geometry_msgs::Point start, const vector<geometry_msgs::Point>* roi = nullptr)
56 {
57  NodeHandle nh;
58 
59  ROS_DEBUG("Starting at (%.2f,%.2f)", start.x, start.y);
60 
61  // get area to cover
62  cpswarm_msgs::GetMap get_map;
63  get_map.request.rotate = true;
64  get_map.request.translate = true;
65  get_map.request.resolution = resolution * 2; // two paths in each cell
66  ServiceClient area_getter;
67  // get a roi
68  if (roi != nullptr && roi->size() > 2) {
69  get_map.request.coords = *roi;
70  area_getter = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetMap>("rois/get_map");
71  swarm_sub.shutdown(); // rois are not divided, stop listening to swarm changes
72  }
73  // get area divided among swarm
74  else if (divide_area) {
75  area_getter = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetMap>("area/get_divided_map");
76  int queue_size;
77  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
78  swarm_sub = nh.subscribe("swarm_state", queue_size, swarm_state_callback); // using divided map, start listening to swarm changes
79  }
80  // get complete area
81  else
82  area_getter = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetMap>("area/get_map");
83  area_getter.waitForExistence();
84  if (area_getter.call(get_map) == false) {
85  ROS_ERROR("Failed to get area coordinates!");
86  return false;
87  }
88  nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid area = get_map.response.map;
89 
90  ROS_INFO("Generate new coverage path...");
91 
92  // construct minimum spanning tree
93  ROS_DEBUG("Construct minimum-spanning-tree...");
94  spanning_tree tree;
95  tree.initialize_graph(area, vertical);
96  tree.construct();
97 
98  // visualize path
99  if (visualize)
100  mst_publisher.publish(tree.get_tree());
101 
102  // generate path
103  ROS_DEBUG("Generate coverage path...");
104  path.initialize_map(area, get_map.response.rotation, vertical);
105  path.initialize_tree(tree.get_mst_edges());
106  if (path.generate_path(start) == false)
107  return false;
108  if (turning_points)
109  path.reduce();
110 
111  // visualize path
112  if (visualize)
113  path_publisher.publish(path.get_path());
114 
115  reconfigure = false;
116 
117  return true;
118 }
119 
125 bool generate_path_callback (const cpswarm_msgs::PathGenerationGoal::ConstPtr& goal, GenerationAction* as)
126 {
127  bool success = generate_path(goal->start, &(goal->area));
128 
129  if (as->isPreemptRequested()) {
130  as->setPreempted();
131  }
132  else if (success) {
133  cpswarm_msgs::PathGenerationResult result;
134  result.path = path.get_path();
135  as->setSucceeded(result);
136  }
137  else {
138  as->setAborted();
139  }
140 
141  return true;
142 }
143 
150 bool get_waypoint (cpswarm_msgs::GetWaypoint::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetWaypoint::Response &res)
151 {
152  // compute new path if it doesn't exist yet or swarm composition has changed
153  if (reconfigure) {
154  if (generate_path(req.position) == false)
155  return false;
156  }
157 
158  // return waypoint
159  res.point = path.get_waypoint(req.position, req.tolerance);
160  res.valid = path.valid();
161 
162  // visualize waypoint
163  if (visualize) {
164  geometry_msgs::PointStamped wp;
165  wp.header.stamp = Time::now();
166  wp.header.frame_id = "map";
167  wp.point = res.point;
168  wp_publisher.publish(wp);
169  }
170 
171  return true;
172 }
173 
180 int main (int argc, char **argv)
181 {
182  // init ros node
183  init(argc, argv, "coverage_path");
184  NodeHandle nh;
185 
186  // init global variables
187  reconfigure = true;
188 
189  // read parameters
190  int queue_size;
191  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
192  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/resolution", resolution, 1.0);
193  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/visualize", visualize, false);
194  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/divide_area", divide_area, false);
195  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/vertical", vertical, false);
196  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/turning_points", turning_points, true);
197 
198  // publishers for introspection
199  if (visualize) {
200  path_publisher = nh.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("coverage_path/path", queue_size, true);
201  wp_publisher = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>("coverage_path/waypoint", queue_size, true);
202  mst_publisher = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseArray>("coverage_path/mst", queue_size, true);
203  }
204 
205  // subscribers for swarm info
206  if (divide_area) {
207  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/swarm_timeout", swarm_timeout, 5.0);
208  nh.getParam(this_node::getName() + "/states", behaviors);
209  swarm_sub = nh.subscribe("swarm_state", queue_size, swarm_state_callback);
210  }
211 
212  // provide waypoint service
213  ServiceServer wp_service = nh.advertiseService("coverage_path/waypoint", get_waypoint);
214 
215  // provide coverage path action
216  GenerationAction generation_action(nh, "coverage_path/generate", boost::bind(&generate_path_callback, _1, &generation_action), false);
217  generation_action.start();
218 
219  ROS_INFO("Path generation action server available");
220 
221  spin();
222 
223  return 0;
224 }
